name: Basic ALttP Dark Room [2.55]
author: Moosh
info: This is a basic DMap script for drawing the light cone effect used by A Link to the Past in dark rooms.
description: This is a basic DMap script for drawing the light cone effect used by A Link to the Past in dark rooms.
setup:
Set the TIL_LTTP_DARKROOM and TIL_LTTP_DARKROOM_TRANS constants to the top-left corners of the two 6x6 tile blocks used for the light cone. 

Depending on the tileset you may also need to set CS_LTTP_DARKROOM to a CSet where the light cone tiles appear black and C_BLACK to the position of the color black in CSet 0.

Assign the DMap script in the DMap editor and give D0 one of the following values:0: Same as 12864: Makes the light cone translucent96: Makes the light cone translucent but darker128: Makes the light cone opaque

Requires std.zh.
